thread.title: Salman Khan is launching my son in two-three years: Suniel Shetty
thread.title_full: Salman Khan is launching my son in two-three years: Suniel Shetty - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Salman Khan is launching my son in two-three years: Suniel Shetty
text:
After launching Suniel Shetty's daughter Athiya in Bollywood, superstar Salman Khan is now gearing up to launch the 'Hera Pheri' actor's son Aahan.
With the remake version of 'Hero' Salman introduced Athiya and Sooraj, son of actor Aditya Pancholi to Hindi audience.
*Salman Khan with Suniel Shetty*
"He (Salman) has plans ... Â»
